body:
Hey, what's up.

I've been approaching old MCZone map authors and trying to get downloads for maps.
This might mean a lot to some of you, so I'm releasing some (previously) private maps.




Check out the MCResourcePile link keeping track of them. None have been uploaded yet, but they will be once I get a significant amount of them.

title: MCZone/Avicus Old Map Downloads

replies.body: clay wars and castle adventure would be good revamps for ctw
